metadata.h1: Olive Garden Pasta Menu With Prices & Calories September 2025
metadata.description: Explore the Olive Garden pasta menu for September 2025, featuring a wide range of pasta dishes with prices and calorie information. From Fettuccine Alfredo to the Create Your Own Pasta option.

items.question: Can I customize my pasta order?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden offers a ‚ÄúCreate Your Own Pasta‚Äù option, allowing you to select your preferred pasta type, sauce, and toppings to craft a dish that suits your taste.

items.question: Are there gluten-free pasta options available?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden provides gluten-free pasta choices. You can request gluten-free rotini and pair it with suitable sauces to enjoy a meal that aligns with your dietary needs.

items.question: Do pasta entr√©es include soup or salad?
items.answer: Yes, all pasta entr√©es come with your choice of soup and salad and the signature breadsticks, enhancing your dining experience with these classic accompaniments.
